Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
Summary: AFTER PRAYER TO YAHWEH, AMEN UFO APPEARED AND FLEW EASTWARD, THEN DISAPPEARED!
divs: Sighting DetailsTO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN, I HAVE BEEN EXPOSED TO THE ART OF SUMMONING UFO'S! I NOTICED THROUGHOUT MY YOUNGER YEARS FROM TIME TO TIME (AT LEAST ONCE A YEAR SINCE 14) THAT A UFO WOULD BE FOLLOWING ME. ORBS, SAUCERS AND EVEN CIGAR SHAPED CRAFT. AT A CERTAIN POINT I REALIZED THEY WHERE INTENTIONALLY REVEALING THEMSELVES TO ME. WHEN I WOULD THINK, "OH THAT WASN'T REAL" THEY WOULD REAPPEAR TO AFFIRM MY DOUBTS AS FALSE! AFTER I MEET PROPHET YAHWEH I LEARNED TO CONTROL THIS PHENOMENA. WHENEVER I PRAY IN THE NAME OF YAHWEH FOR A SIGHTING THEY COME...THE ONLY TIMES THEY DON'T SHOW IS WHEN WE TRY TO IMPRESS PEOPLE, NON-PROPER WEATHER CONDITIONS, OR TOO MUCH AIR TRAFFIC! I AM ONLY SHARING THIS FOR MY QUESTIONS TO BE ANSWERED, BECAUSE THEY DON'T LAND TO TALK TO ME. OR AT LEAST AS FAR AS I REMEMBER!!!
